segments.text: What do you want to do in this company after five years ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to be in a higher managerial position in the field of international marketing . I ’ m very interested in the European market hopefully , in Brussels .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s truly exciting to work in newly emerging unified market . Brussels will be center of the new market in the continent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you looking for in your next job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My experience in my last job showed that I have the talent to motivate people . It could be seen from the low absentee rate in my team . I want to continue that kind of contribution and to further develop this potential .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to apply my knowledge and experience to a challenging position and finally move on to management level .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you consider important when looking for a job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the most important thing is the nature of the job . One should never do anything one is not interested in . To me , pleasant working conditions with co-operative staff are also important .
segments.speaker: S2
